extendedInfo.description: School may be out for summer, but the gossip is flying faster than ever in School 26: Summer of Secrets. Play as Kate as she navigates the social landscape with her new friends. Help them overcome difficult issues, establish love connections, and bring your friends together so that they can enter an epic battle of the bands.Along the way, everyone has a secret theyâre itching to tell you. Convince your friends to dish, then use your tact to share their secrets with the right people. If you succeed, youâll help your friends out. Will you become the ultimate people-uniter, bringing your friends together in harmony... or the school blabbermouth?School 26: Summer of Secrets features the music of indie rock band Hey Ocean!

reviews.title: decent
reviews.comment: I had no problems running this game on my galaxy s3 ...just didnt think it was GREAT like the first one. plus, it kept telling me my personality traits and who was my closest friend...and none of it made sense for the reactions I gave.
reviews.author: Makaii Melissa

reviews.title: Awsome..
reviews.comment: This game is freaking awsome. Download this right away.
reviews.author: Charles Randle

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: It worked for about 10 mins with 3 crashes between. The last crash made it not work AT ALL! Terrible, terrible terrible. Fix this please!!!!!! >:(
reviews.author: Cedrea E

reviews.title: Excellent!!!!
reviews.comment: I have the first one and I was really excited to get this one. It\'s so addicting and fun. It also makes me laugh a little. The only things I would want to change is to let Kate date and change her clothes. Maybe even let her reply with words also. That\'d be awesome but overall this is like my favorite game. I definitely recommend it! :) p.s I hope there\'s gonna be 3rd one.
reviews.author: Payton Faith

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: Good game but freezes way  to much  And kinda short other than that amazing game!

reviews.comment: Fix your broken game or l will be demanding a refund from the play store!! Constant crashes!

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: The game crashes soon as you start building the band. Terrible. Needs to fix gliches and update program. And make the game saves player progress. The game has a good story line and plot. But need to be able to go to other places . And player needs to have their own storyline within the story as well. Please fix. I uninstalled game until then.    :~(

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Please make more! It\'s so fun and addicting! I will buy every one that you put on of school 26!
